unnormalised: So, my cousin's wedding. Big fat Indian wedding, you know the drill. My job? Planning the sangeet. *Sangeet*! The thing is, I'm about as coordinated as a newborn giraffe on roller skates. Mom thinks I can prepone everything... HA! The date? Originally 12/12/2024. Should be a chill affair, right?
normalised: So, my cousin's wedding. Big fat Indian wedding, you know the drill. My job? Planning the sangeet. Asterisk Sangeet asterisk! The thing is, I'm about as coordinated as a newborn giraffe on roller skates. Mom thinks I can prepone everything... H-A! The date? Originally twelfth december two thousand and twenty four. Should be a chill affair, right?

unnormalised: Wrong. Turns out, 12/12 is *also* peak wedding season. Finding a decent DJ at 8:00 PM? Forget it. Every band is booked solid. We're talking *months* in advance. I even tried bribing DJ Vicky – offered him an extra Rs. 5000. He laughed. My only saving grace? My best friend Priya, who's secretly a Bollywood dance guru.
normalised: Wrong. Turns out, twelfth december is asterisk also asterisk peak wedding season. Finding a decent D-J at eight P-M? Forget it. Every band is booked solid. We're talking asterisk months asterisk in advance. I even tried bribing D-J Vicky – offered him an extra rupee five thousand. He laughed. My only saving grace? My best friend Priya, who's secretly a Bollywood dance guru.

unnormalised: Priya says we can still pull off a killer sangeet if we start practicing... yesterday. Rehearsals EVERYDAY at 6:30 PM. Oh joy! Also, apparently, the theme is "Retro Bollywood," meaning I have to find a bell-bottom suit from the '70s. Pray for me. Send help (and maybe a time machine).
normalised: Priya says we can still pull off a killer sangeet if we start practicing... yesterday. Rehearsals E-V-E-R-Y-D-A-Y at six thirty P-M. Oh joy! Also, apparently, the theme is "Retro Bollywood," meaning I have to find a bell-bottom suit from the seventies. Pray for me. Send help (and maybe a time machine).

unnormalised: So, wish me luck. May the algorithms of fate be ever in my favour, and may I survive this sangeet planning process with my sanity (and my dance moves) intact. I'll update you all again near 10/12/2024, that is, IF I survive until then. Any tips on avoiding aunty gossip sessions will also be appreciated. Peace out!
